title: Work to move the plates of a capacitor

content.description: A parallel plate capacitor has plate area <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and plate separation <math alttext="d" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The capacitor is given a charge <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and then isolated. The distance between the plates can then be varied, and several values can be measured.
content.question: How much work is required to change the separation between the charged plates from <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="3 d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction Q squared d, over 2 epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 3 Q squared d, over 2 epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 9 Q squared d, over 2 epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction Q squared d, over epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction Q squared d, over 6 epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction Q squared d, over epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
